mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(FRCS_ID) AS CNT FROM( SELECT A.MEM_ID, A.MEM_NAME, A.MEM_TEL, A.MEM_EMAIL, B.FRCS_ID, A.OWNER_ID, B.FRCS_NAME, B.FRCS_STATE, B.FRCS_TEL, TO_CHAR(B.FRCS_OPDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FRCS_OPDATE, B.FRCS_POST, B.FRCS_ADD1, B.FRCS_ADD2 FROM( SELECT FO.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_TEL, M.MEM_EMAIL, FO.FRCS_ID, FO.OWNER_ID FROM MEMBER M, FRCS_OWNERSHIP FO WHERE M.MEM_ID = FO.MEM_ID ) A , FRANCHISE B WHERE A.FRCS_ID = B.FRCS_ID )

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM selng_date) as year, SUM(selng_qy * selng_price) as total_price FROM dailyselling WHERE frcs_id = #{frcsId} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM selng_date) = #{curMonth} GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM selng_date)

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM d.selng_date) AS year, SUM(d.selng_qy * d.selng_price * 0.03) AS frcs_rowal FROM dailyselling d JOIN head_menu h ON d.menu_cd = h.menu_cd WHERE d.frcs_id = #{frcsId} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM d.selng_date) = #{curMonth} GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM d.selng_date)
select nvl(sum(dues_elcty + dues_water + dues_gas + dues_mtht),0) as publicdues_total from publicdues where frcs_id = #{frcsId} and dues_payde = #{yearMonth} and dues_mthtyn = 'Y'

SELECT NVL(SUM(fo.frcsorder_amt), 0) AS frcsorder_total FROM franchise f JOIN frcsorder fo ON f.frcs_id = fo.frcs_id WHERE f.frcs_id = #{frcsId} AND TO_CHAR(fo.frcsorder_date, 'YYYY-MM') = #{yearMonth}
